Uses of Interface
t7.expressions.Expression

  • Packages that use Expression 
    Package Description
    t7  
    t7.expressions  
    t7.statements  

    • Uses of Expression in t7

      Method parameters in t7 with type arguments of type Expression 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private int StatementHandler.instantiate(StructureTemplate template, java.util.ArrayList<Expression> vars, java.util.ArrayList<BooleanExpression> bools, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names, int index, java.lang.String[] values)
      Attempts to create instances recursively, each call will iterate on all possible values for the variables at index (that satisfy the relating boolean expression if provided).

    • Uses of Expression in t7.expressions

      Classes in t7.expressions that implement Expression 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArithmeticExpression
      Represents an Arithmetic Expression, it could be a single value, or a variable, or a binary expression.
      class  BooleanExpression
      Represents a Boolean Expression, it could be a single value, or a variable, or a binary expression.
      class  TripletExpression
      A Triplet Expression is made of three arithmetic expressions (start, end, step which is optional).
      class  VariableExpression
      A Variable expression is just a variable access.

      The boolean condition for the If statement (Could be a boolean expression, or a boolean variable).

      The boolean condition for looping (Could be a boolean expression, or a boolean variable).
      private Expression VariableDefinitionStatement.expression
      The variable's type and value.
